archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0310
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to supply customers who are vulnerable with an appropriate way of calling 111 emergency services during a power cut, so that vulnerable customers feel safe.

properties.value: Emergency call is realized outside of BSS, any other services should be supported? Parked until more details are known.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
